name: Minecraft: The Wild Update
description: A serene and adventurous soundtrack for Minecraft's The Wild Update.

downloads.overrideDescription:
§6The Wild Update soundtrack features a serene and adventurous collection of music tracks composed by Lena Raine, capturing the essence of the new biomes and features in Minecraft's The Wild Update.
§2§o1st disc out of 3.

§6The Wild Update soundtrack features a serene and adventurous collection of music tracks composed by Lena Raine, capturing the essence of the new biomes and features in Minecraft's The Wild Update.
§2§o2nd disc out of 3.

§6The Wild Update soundtrack features a serene and adventurous collection of music tracks composed by Lena Raine, capturing the essence of the new biomes and features in Minecraft's The Wild Update.
§2§o3rd disc out of 3.
